name: Racing Traffic Car Tubor
description:
Racing Traffic Car Tubor is waiting for real traffic racer. Start an ultra-amazing city racing journey same as traffic racer game with one of the best race car games! This real racing simulator will improve your driving skills.
Features

- Endless asphalt tracks to drive in extreme traffic rush.
- Multiple fast and speedy sports cars and formula cars.
- Different thrilling racing game missions to play.
- 4 different and amazing game modes.
- Headlight option for the night mode.
